bit.name: Ordnance Map
bit.tooltip: we need to ask the ordnance map system about some stuff

tagblock.name: Postprocess Definition

int8.name: Level Of Smallest Mipmap To Use
Level Of Largest Mipmap To Use

tagblock.name: Float Constants
tagblock.comment: For tints a = Red, b = Green, c = Blue

This pointer goes to a dataref (x14 bytes) elsewhere in memory which contains the given buffer. A table in the tag header contains pointers to these pointers. Assembly automatically handles this data.

bit.name: Render Via Back Buffer
bit.tooltip: we draw the bipeds into a back buffer before they are splatted into the front buffer; expensive

float32.name: Falloff Begin Radius
float32.tooltip: between this and max radius, we go smoothly from on to off

float32.name: Motion Sensor Inactive Fade Time
float32.tooltip: if "linked to motion sensor" is checked, this is how long it takes to fade after you stop activity

float32.name: Active Camo Visible Velocity
float32.tooltip: if a unit has active camo and is moving faster than this, it will be shown

bit.name: Bipeds As Quads
bit.tooltip: instead of drawing the whole model, just do a quad

float32.tooltip: keys off the "AI scariness" field of each weapon
